snippet.title: PIXELS: Digital Creatures Early Access Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
PIXELS is a turn-based combat roguelike where you battle with and against powerful, digital creatures called Pixels. Fight your way through an ever-changing Virtual World where you never know what's around the corner! Recruit, Battle, Discover, Shop, Rest. What Team will you lead to Victory?

PIXELS launches into Early Access July 11 2022!

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1712750/PIXELS_Digital_Creatures/
Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/k2bf7UrfvX
Follow us on Twitter! @anigramstudios
www.pixelsdc.com
